MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH45 postcode area of Peebles, affecting properties in Violet Bank and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located a blown fuse at the Rosetta Road substation which has been caused by a fault on our underground cable network and we now expect your supply to be restored by 3pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20am on the 6th of March 2021.
